title: Traits and Features
content: Traits and Features In Baldur's Gate 3, refer to the unique actions and attributes that a character can perform and obtain depending on their Class and Race or Subrace. The Traits are acquired only by specific Races while Features are available to any character and are determined by their Class. Each Class also has several Subclasses that players can select after gaining sufficient XP.
